name: Learn Tagalog - Flashcards for Kids
description:
Are you or your kids having trouble learning the national language of the Philippines (Tagalog)? Perhaps this app should help you solve your problem. Loaded with variety of essential topics, the app features tons of colorful and carefully chosen flashcards that would aid beginners by introducing them to common Tagalog words and kick-start their way to understanding the official language of Filipinos.

Main Features:

* Interactive and colorful flash cards
* Scoring and timer
* Wide range of topics (animals, fruits, vegetables, common things, colors, shapes, numbers, buildings, surroundings, parts of the body, transportation, and verbs
* More features to be added upon each update!
